Trample
CARDNAME enters the battlefield with seven +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever CARDNAME deals damage, you gain that much life.
If damage would be dealt to CARDNAME, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME.

trans-unit.source: "Another failure," grumbled the toymaker. She slammed the door with such gusto that she failed to notice the eyes watching her.
trans-unit.target: 「又失败了，」玩具师傅嘟囔着。她失望地甩上房门，却全然没注意到玩具的眼睛在看着她。

trans-unit.source: Even after thousands of years, the wondrous creations of the Thran guarded the lost empire's secrets with single-minded devotion.
trans-unit.target: 纵使已过数千年，索蓝人的神奇造物仍尽心尽力地守护着失落帝国的秘密。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·269 | Renewed Faith | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You gain 6 life.\nCycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)\nWhen you cycle CARDNAME, you may gain 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 你获得6点生命。 循环{1}{W}（{1}{W}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。） 当你循环CARDNAME时，你可以获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Skepticism fades in the face of the miraculous.
trans-unit.target: 神迹当前，疑虑渐散。

trans-unit.source: Savannah Lions
trans-unit.target: 草原雄狮

trans-unit.source: "One alone is fearsome; one among many is unstoppable."\n—Benalish proverb
trans-unit.target: 「雄狮独行威震四方；雄狮成群势不可当。」 ～宾纳里亚谚语

trans-unit.source: Serra Angel
trans-unit.target: 撒拉天使

trans-unit.resname: DMR·271 | Serra Angel | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance
trans-unit.target: 飞行，警戒

trans-unit.source: The angel remembers her past lives like dreams. Her song held up meadows. Her blade drove back darkness. Her wings carried her across the ages.
trans-unit.target: 她的往日身影如梦境一般不断重现天使脑海。颂赞歌传扬牧地。举利剑驱散黑暗。展双翼飞越时代。

trans-unit.source: Serra Avatar
trans-unit.target: 撒拉圣者

trans-unit.resname: DMR·272 | Serra Avatar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to your life total.\nWhen CARDNAME is put into a graveyard from anywhere, shuffle it into its owner's library.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量和防御力各等同于你的总生命。 当CARDNAME从任何区域进入坟墓场时，将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: Though Serra is long dead, her legacy of grace and kindness will live on forever.
trans-unit.target: 虽然撒拉已死去多时，但她的美德与善良将永远流传。

trans-unit.source: Sevinne's Reclamation
trans-unit.target: 瑟纹的复还

trans-unit.resname: DMR·273 | Sevinne's Reclamation | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target permanent card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If this spell was cast from a graveyard, you may copy this spell and may choose a new target for the copy.\nFlashback {4}{W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标法术力值等于或小于3的永久物牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。如果此咒语是从坟墓场施放，则你可以复制此咒语，且可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 返照{4}{W}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Spirit Link
trans-unit.target: 心灵羁绊

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nWhenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 每当所结附的生物造成伤害时，你获得等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: "We are all inextricably linked, souls woven in tapestry."
trans-unit.target: 「我们的命运注定彼此通连，灵魂交缠有如挂毯。」

trans-unit.resname: DMR·275 | Swords to Plowshares | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 化剑为犁

trans-unit.resname: DMR·275 | Swords to Plowshares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The arc of my blade has carved a path of light for the peace that will follow."
trans-unit.target: 「利刃尖锋已然辟开光明大道，和平自会随之降临。」

trans-unit.resname: DMR·276 | Test of Endurance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Test of Endurance
trans-unit.target: 耐力试炼

trans-unit.resname: DMR·276 | Test of Endurance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你的总生命为50或更多，则你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·276 | Test of Endurance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Most wars are won not by those with the best tactics or truest cause but simply by the ones left standing.
trans-unit.target: 大多数战争打到最后，并不是拼哪方战术优秀、战意坚定，而是比谁能活得更久。

trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Saltfield nomads call a sudden storm a "whitemane."

trans-unit.target: 「她的声音蕴含正义，清晰而不息。」 ～雪仇天使爱若玛

trans-unit.target: 全能的阿卡尼思

trans-unit.target: {T}：抓三张牌。 {2}{U}{U}：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: He has journeyed where none have been before. Now he returns to ensure that none follow.
trans-unit.target: 他的足迹遍及前人未达之处。现在他折返以确定无人可循迹而至。

trans-unit.target: 深海潜兽

trans-unit.resname: DMR·282 | Denizen of the Deep | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: According to merfolk legend, a denizen of the deep swallows the horizon at the end of each day, bringing on the cold blanket of night.
trans-unit.target: 根据人鱼传说，深海潜兽在白日结束时吞下地平线，寒夜随即笼罩汪洋。

trans-unit.target: 真伪莫辨

trans-unit.resname: DMR·283 | Fact or Fiction | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的五张牌。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·283 | Fact or Fiction | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Slimefoot, I know I said I wanted to grow our repository of knowledge, but this isn't what I had in mind."
trans-unit.target: 「黏足，我是说过要丰富我们的知识储备，但我想的不是这种方式。」

trans-unit.resname: DMR·284 | Force of Will | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 待陶拉里亚西境学院禁止时间操纵课程之后，学生才真正晓得时间的价值。

trans-unit.target: 「合拢城墙！收起码头！荷马利族来袭！」 ～阿基夫哨兵本森

trans-unit.target: 「我一向决断迅速。只是我现在随着年岁阅历增长，决断也越来越正确。」 ～泰菲力

Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.

Flying
Cumulative upkeep—
Discard a card. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
When CARDNAME dies, draw a card for each age counter on it.

trans-unit.source: Those who forget the horrors of the past are doomed to re-meet them.

trans-unit.source: Necrosavant
trans-unit.target: 死灵学者

trans-unit.source: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only during your upkeep.
trans-unit.target: {3}{B}{B}，牺牲一个生物：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于你的维持中起动。

trans-unit.source: To the novice necromancers, it looked exactly like a regular human grave.
trans-unit.target: 对新手死灵术士来说，这里看起来就跟普通人类坟墓一模一样。

trans-unit.source: No Mercy
trans-unit.target: 绝不宽贷

trans-unit.resname: DMR·308 | No Mercy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物对你造成伤害时，将它消灭。

trans-unit.source: "We had years to prepare, while they had mere minutes."\n—Kerrick, sleeper agent
trans-unit.target: 「我们有好几年的时间可以准备，而他们只有短短几分钟。」 ～潜藏密探格瑞克

trans-unit.source: Oversold Cemetery
trans-unit.target: 超卖墓园

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have four or more creature cards in your graveyard, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你坟墓场中有四张或更多生物牌，则你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: It was a profitable scheme, at least until the dead began to object.
trans-unit.target: 这是笔油水丰厚的买卖～至少直到死人起身反对前都是如此。

trans-unit.source: Royal Assassin
trans-unit.target: 皇家刺客

trans-unit.source: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature.

trans-unit.source: Trained in the arts of stealth, royal assassins choose their victims carefully, relying on timing and precision rather than brute force.
trans-unit.target: 修习匿踪技艺的皇家刺客总是细心选择其牺牲品，不倚仗蛮力，即时且精准地行动。

trans-unit.source: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.
trans-unit.target: 由于不敢照亮黑暗中潜伏之物，温地摩街的灯火在半夜自动熄灭，并且再也点不着。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·379 | Helm of Awakening | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Spells cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·379 | Helm of Awakening | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This little prize will cover your head, your spells, your bets, and your behind!"\n—Pashad ibn Asim, Suq'Ata trader
trans-unit.target: 「这个小宝物可以护住你的头、你的咒语、你的赌注，还有你的背后！」 ～舒夸塔贸易商帕沙德伊本阿新

trans-unit.source: Icy Manipulator
trans-unit.target: 寒冰操弄器

trans-unit.resname: DMR·380 | Icy Manipulator | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Tap target artifact, creature, or land.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：横置目标神器，生物或地。

trans-unit.source: In fire there is the spark of chaos and destruction, the seed of life. In ice there is perfect tranquility, perfect order, and the silence of death.
trans-unit.target: 火焰蕴含着浑沌与毁灭的鼓动，以及生命的种子。寒冰蕴含着安宁与秩序的完善，以及死亡的寂静。

trans-unit.source: Jester's Cap
trans-unit.target: 小丑帽

trans-unit.resname: DMR·381 | Jester's Cap | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: {2}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从目标牌手的牌库中搜寻三张牌，并将它们放逐。然后该牌手洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The crowd laughed heartily at the fool's performance, until his hat laughed back.
trans-unit.target: 小丑演出让众人开怀大笑，直到他的帽子以笑声回敬。

trans-unit.source: Juggernaut
trans-unit.target: 攻城巨车

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME attacks each combat if able.\nCARDNAME can't be blocked by Walls.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。 CARDNAME不能被墙阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "Urza's machines have a splendid habit of excavating themselves."\n—Rona, disciple of Gix
trans-unit.target: 「克撒的机械都有着让自己破土而出的好习惯。」 ～基克斯信徒罗娜

trans-unit.source: Legacy Weapon
trans-unit.target: 远古神兵

trans-unit.resname: DMR·383 | Legacy Weapon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Exile target permanent.\nIf CARDNAME would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal CARDNAME and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
trans-unit.target: {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}：放逐目标永久物。 如果CARDNAME将从任何区域进入坟墓场，则改为展示CARDNAME，并将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: In a single blinding flash, Yawgmoth was obliterated, and Urza could finally rest.
trans-unit.target: 一道夺目闪光掠过，约格莫夫被全数抹灭，克撒终得安息。

trans-unit.source: Lotus Blossom
trans-unit.target: 莲花丛

trans-unit.resname: DMR·384 | Lotus Blossom | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a petal counter on CARDNAME.\n{T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of petal counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，你可以在CARDNAME上放置一个花瓣指示物。 {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：加X点任意颜色的单色法术力，X为CARDNAME上的花瓣指示物数量。

trans-unit.source: Mind Stone
trans-unit.target: 心灵石

trans-unit.resname: DMR·385 | Mind Stone | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{1}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {1}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "What is mana but possibility, an idea not yet given form?"\n—Jhoira, master artificer
trans-unit.target: 「法术力是尚无定形的理念，那这无穷的可能性又是什么？」 ～神器大师尤依拉

trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "It has been my honor to improve on Thran's original design. Perhaps history will remember me in some small part for my work."\n—Urza, in his apprenticeship
trans-unit.target: 「能改良索蓝原始设计是我的荣幸。也许历史会为我的成果记下一小笔功劳。」 ～学徒时期的克撒

trans-unit.source: Thran Golem
trans-unit.target: 索蓝魔像

trans-unit.resname: DMR·387 | Thran Golem | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is enchanted, it gets +2/+2 and has flying, first strike, and trample.
trans-unit.target: 只要CARDNAME受有灵气，它便得+2/+2且具有飞行、先攻与践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: Even after thousands of years, the wondrous creations of the Thran guarded the lost empire's secrets with single-minded devotion.
trans-unit.target: 纵使已过数千年，索蓝人的神奇造物仍尽心尽力地守护着失落帝国的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Tormod's Crypt
trans-unit.target: 托玛墓穴

trans-unit.resname: DMR·388 | Tormod's Crypt | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Exile target player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：放逐目标牌手的坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.
trans-unit.target: 多明纳里亚最奢侈的墓穴也不过装着个空坟墓。

trans-unit.source: Triskelion
trans-unit.target: 三臂铁人

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.\nRemove a +1/+1 counter from CARDNAME: It deals 1 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个+1/+1指示物。 从CARDNAME上移去一个+1/+1指示物：它对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "What's got three legs and three heads and wants to kill us? That's not a riddle!"\n—Jayeen, Fallaji scout
trans-unit.target: 「什么东西有三头三手，还想杀掉我们？这不是谜语！」 ～法拉吉斥候杰琳

trans-unit.source: Umbilicus
trans-unit.target: 脐带

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may pay 2 life. If they don't, they return a permanent they control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的维持开始时，该牌手可以支付2点生命。若其未如此作，则他将一个由其操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: It was the explorers' only tether to reality.
trans-unit.target: 这是唯一将探险家们系留于现实世界的东西。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Blueprints
trans-unit.target: 克撒的设计蓝图

trans-unit.resname: DMR·391 | Urza's Blueprints | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Echo {6} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)\n{T}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 返响{6}（在你的维持开始时，若你在你前一个维持开始后才操控它，则除非你支付其返响费用，否则牺牲之。） {T}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: From concept to paper to reality.
trans-unit.target: 先有概念，而后纸上作业，终而实现。

trans-unit.source: Urza's Incubator
trans-unit.target: 克撒的抚育设备

trans-unit.resname: DMR·392 | Urza's Incubator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreature spells of the chosen type cost {2} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种生物类别。 该类别的生物咒语减少{2}来施放。

trans-unit.source: "Our recruitment drives are bringing in fewer fresh troops every day. We need a new strategy."\n—Urza, to Tawnos
trans-unit.target: 「我们的征兵宣传每天招徕的新员数量越来越少。我们得有新的方案。」 ～克撒嘱咐达硌士

trans-unit.target: 除非你操控山脉或平原，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{W}。

trans-unit.source: The sunlight falls pristine on the temple at Epityr, softened by the remembered shadows of angelic saviors' wings.
trans-unit.target: 纯洁阳光洒落艾比提殿堂，穿过为人追忆的救世天使双翼而更加柔和。

trans-unit.target: 黑暗深渊

trans-unit.resname: DMR·394 | Dark Depths | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with ten ice counters on it.\n{3}: Remove an ice counter from CARDNAME.\nWhen CARDNAME has no ice counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, create Marit Lage, a legendary 20/20 black Avatar creature token with flying and indestructible.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有十个寒冰指示物。 {3}：从CARDNAME上移去一个寒冰指示物。 当CARDNAME上没有寒冰指示物时，将它牺牲。若你如此作，则派出传奇衍生生物玛莉雷基，其为20/20黑色，具飞行与不灭异能的圣者。

trans-unit.target: 宝石矿脉

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield with three mining counters on it.\n{T}, Remove a mining counter from CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on CARDNAME, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个采矿指示物。 {T}，从CARDNAME上移去一个采矿指示物：加一点任意颜色的法术力。如果CARDNAME上没有采矿指示物，则将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: "Our ancestors brought down a Phyrexian portal ship, then built our town on its hull. We're pretty proud of that."\n—Alene of Riverspan
trans-unit.target: 「我们的先祖曾击落一艘非瑞克西亚境界通道飞船，然后借其舰身建成如今这座城市。我们都以此为荣。」 ～河境城的艾琳

trans-unit.source: Serra's blessing lies strongest upon Sursi, where her holy chapels are untouched even as evil encroaches.
trans-unit.target: 撒拉的祝福在苏西最为强大，就连在邪恶侵袭时，其神圣礼拜堂仍能屹立不摇。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，先攻，系命 由你操控的其他天使得+1/+1且具有系命异能。

trans-unit.source: An angel among angels, she carries the hopes of the world skyward.
trans-unit.target: 她是天使中的英杰，承载世界希望直冲天际。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·414 | Test of Endurance | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 耐力试炼

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 50 or more life, you win the game.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，若你的总生命为50或更多，则你赢得这盘游戏。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·414 | Test of Endurance | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I could do this all day."
trans-unit.target: 「我能杀上一整天。」

trans-unit.source: Windborn Muse
trans-unit.target: 风生谬思

trans-unit.resname: DMR·415 | Windborn Muse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCreatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.source: A single glimpse was enough to compel Captain Velkarne to lay down his sword and take up the poet's quill.
trans-unit.target: 仅惊鸿一瞥，就足以让维凯恩队长回心转意、弃武修文。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·416 | Wrath of God | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wrath of God
trans-unit.target: 神之愤怒

trans-unit.resname: DMR·416 | Wrath of God | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·416 | Wrath of God | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Each side prayed for the gods to smite the other. In the end, all their prayers were answered.
trans-unit.target: 皆祈对手受天罚。所有祷告均应验。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·417 | Denizen of the Deep | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Denizen of the Deep
trans-unit.target: 深海潜兽

trans-unit.resname: DMR·417 | Denizen of the Deep | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将所有由你操控的其他生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·417 | Denizen of the Deep | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Don't be silly, Grandfather. If the tides were caused by some monster drinking the ocean, wouldn't more ships go missing?"\n—Leda, Vodalian youth
trans-unit.target: 「爷爷，别傻了。如果真是巨兽饮海致潮汐涨落，那应该有更多船只失踪才是？」 ～伏特里亚青年勒达

trans-unit.source: Force of Will
trans-unit.target: 意志之力

trans-unit.resname: DMR·418 | Force of Will | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 你可以支付1点生命并从你手上放逐一张蓝色牌，而不支付此咒语的法术力费用。 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.resname: DMR·418 | Force of Will | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Weren't you ever taught that it's rude to interrupt?"
trans-unit.target: 「随便插嘴很没修养，没人教过你吗？」

trans-unit.source: High Tide
trans-unit.target: 高潮

trans-unit.source: "May Svyelun's waves drown your memory."\n—Traditional merfolk curse
trans-unit.target: 「愿希亚尔的波涛清干你的记忆。」 ～传统人鱼诅咒

trans-unit.source: Mystic Remora
trans-unit.target: 神秘鱼阵

trans-unit.source: Cumulative upkeep {1} (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)\nWhenever an opponent casts a noncreature spell, you may draw a card unless that player pays {4}.
trans-unit.target: 累积维持{1}（在你的维持开始时，在此永久物上放置一个岁月指示物，然后除非你为其上每个岁月指示物支付其维持费用，否则牺牲之。） 每当任一对手施放非生物咒语时，除非该牌手支付{4}，否则你可以抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 神秘导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，然后洗牌，并将该牌置于牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: Wisdom is a well that never runs dry. It offers the most to those with the deepest thirst for knowledge.
trans-unit.target: 智慧乃不竭水井，唯最渴求知识者方获益至深。

trans-unit.source: Time Stretch

trans-unit.source: Target player takes two extra turns after this one.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的两个回合。

trans-unit.source: There's lots of time like the present.
trans-unit.target: 机非不可失，时仍会再来。

trans-unit.source: Urza, Lord High Artificer
trans-unit.target: 铸物勋爵克撒

trans-unit.resname: DMR·423 | Urza, Lord High Artificer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 0/0 colorless Construct artifact creature token with "This creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact you control."\nTap an untapped artifact you control: Add {U}.\n{5}: Shuffle your library, then exile the top card. Until end of turn, you may play that card without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个0/0无色组构体衍生神器生物，且具有「你每操控一个神器，此生物便得+1/+1。」 横置一个由你操控且未横置的神器：加{U}。 {5}：将你的牌库洗牌，然后放逐顶牌。直到回合结束，你可以使用该牌且不需支付其法术力费用。
